keepsNodes.title: describe-instances
keepsNodes.description: Will return a description of all the EC2 instances.

keepsNodes.title: describe-instances, filter by Name tag
keepsNodes.description: Will return instances based on a given Name tag value.

keepsNodes.title: start-instances by id (dropdown)
keepsNodes.description: Will start an EC2 instance by a selected id.

keepsNodes.title: start-instances by id (free-text)
keepsNodes.description: Will start an EC2 instance by a given id.

keepsNodes.title: stop-instance by id (free-text)
keepsNodes.description: Will stop an EC2 instance by a given id.

keepsNodes.title: stop-instances by id (dropdown)
keepsNodes.description: Will stop an EC2 instance by a selected id.

keepsNodes.title: terminate an instance by id (dropdown)
keepsNodes.description: Will terminate an instance by a selected id.

keepsNodes.title: terminate an instance by id (free-text)
keepsNodes.description: Will terminate an instance by a selected id.
